import './AddRecipes.css' import React from "react" const AddRecipes = (props) => { const nameRecipesRef = React.useRef(); const servingRef = React.useRef(); const imageUrlRef = React.useRef(); const newRecipeRef = (event) => { props.addRecipes(event, { name : nameRecipesRef.current.value, numPeople: servingRef.current.value, imageUrl: imageUrlRef.current.value }) } return (

Añade nueva receta

{newRecipeRef(event)}}>
) } export default AddRecipes
